title: Google Stadia Price And Launch Details Revealed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.06.19
description:
Start your trial month for $5 at http://forhims.com/gamesdaily

Get 74% off the Father's Day Steak fix gift package at http://omahasteaks.com and enter code: KFGAMES in the search bar.

Tim and Andy go over all the Google Stadia news, the latest E3 announcements, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:01:35 - Housekeeping
Kinda Funny Games E3 Showcase - Monday, June 10th @ 4:30 p.m. PT 60+ indie games. youtube.com/kindfunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Daniel Massey, Black Jack, Colton Yoder, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:03:50 - Google Stadia - Jonathaon Dornbush IGN
00:22:25 - Baldurs Gate 3 announced for PC and Stadia from the makers of Divinity Original Sin 2(Matt Purslow IGN)
00:24:48 - Destiny 2 Shadowkeep Formerly Announced (Jessie Wade IGN)
00:27:15 - Capcom Updates E3 Plans
00:29:05 - Playtonic Teasing next Game Reveal Tomorrow
00:31:02 - THQ Nordic game reveal at 11AM
00:34:40 - Out today
00:37:05 -  HIMS
00:38:30 - OMAHA STEAKS
Reader mail   -
00:42:32 Specifically on the go, how will you use Stadia, if at all? - James Davis
00:46:27 Did the Stadia get you? - Nano Biologist
00:51:00 - With the all-digital storefront of Stadia, what do you think about the longevity of the service? Do you think it may last 5, 10 or 20 years, especially with the fact that games that have been bought might vanish once Google would end the service? - Arvel
00:54:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Fran & Gamespot’s Mike Mahardy
